column17:
Tous In Heaven Her Eau de Toilette - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2790

She certainly does not play by the rules; she discovered long back that living on the wild side is far more fun and she embraces the feral wildness that was suffused within her being. She is a woman of the world adhering to no rules and paving her own path. She is not afraid she picks herself up when she stumbles and makes sure she gets it right the next time. The fashion house of Tous salutes her spirit with In Heaven a fragrance that lives at the confluence of the good and the bad. The luxury Eau de Toilette adds an edge to your life and lets you experiment with yourself and your world.

The fruity opening notes with accords of pineapple crunchy apple and red berries adds a touch of peppy fun to the fragrance. The heart hides a potion which has accords of blue freesia white peony lilacs and muguet which rest happily on a base of creamy sandalwood Atlas cedar and smoky vetiver which give the dry down a twist of smoky texture. Launched in October 2008 the wildness of Tous In Heaven was created under the careful and expert guidance of Vincent Schaller. The smoothly rounded flacon with pink accents highlights the untamed nature of the woman it adorns. Live for yourself love with a will and laugh your way through life with Tous In Heaven coloring your path and your spirit.

column17:
Tous H2O Eau de Toilette - 50 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2520

Refreshing like a drop of water in a dry arid desert H2O from the Italian fashion house of Tous is more than simply a fragrance. Through an inspired concoction of citrusy and floral notes H2O seeks to envelop you in a mist of sparkling clean freshness that rejuvenates you with its invigorating enticement. Through this luxury Eau de Toilette renowned perfumer Sophia Constant seeks to establish an essential link between beauty and substance and not just create another vapid and frivolous aroma.

This feminine aquatic concentrate for women opens with a crisp fruity top note of organic lemon and honeyed lavender which trails into an airy delicately floral heart of rose and jasmine. The earthy woody base note of cedar white amber and scented Australian sandalwood adds a touch of pleasing warmth. H2O induces a sense of carefree living of freedom from the chores of life with its natural engaging aquatic aroma and its enticing warmth.

Encased in a transparent briolette-cut blue vial fashioned with faceted crystals and a pyramid-like lid with a golden tag H2O by Tous is like a pure drop of water - the source of all life. In keeping with this message Tous also makes a social commitment - one percent of the retail price is donated to Oxfam who provides clean drinking water to underdeveloped countries. H2O is pure sophistication that also sends a message.

column17:
Tous Baby Eau de Cologne - 100 ml (Unisex) Price: Rs.2205

Classified as a purely refreshing and fruity floral fragrance Baby Tous Eau De Cologne possesses an amalgamation of exotic flowers capable of harvesting an optimistic and euphoric energy. Developed from the nose of veteran perfumers Shyamala Maisondieu and Michael Girard Baby Tous was launched in 2007. The fragrance derives its essence from a cocktail of luscious exquisite flowers fruits and flavors making it perfect for both men and women.

Rejuvenating you in every sense this Eau De Cologne celebrates the luminous notes of mandarin orange neroli and bergamot at the top gently opening up to heart notes of orange blossom apple pear and rose. The floral heart notes eventually evolve to a rich and sensual blend of musk petit grain and cedar. With the vibrant and fresh aroma this EDC by Tous invites summer gracefully with its unceasing attempt to win your heart.
